short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep upto date with your favorite Discovery Network shows, news and TV schedule with one single button click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lite Site | Access to Discovery Network is a simple, easy to use extension that lets you access news, information, TV schedules, videos and photo's from your favorite Discovery Network shows.  

With just one click you have a pop-up window with all the news, stories, videos and more - right from the browser.   No more changing websites, opening new Tabs - one click and you have all the access to Discovery Network that you need!
